content.title: Who am I?
content.subtitle: I'm Tom√°s Yovino, a Fullstack Developer specialized in Javascript.
content.paragraph: I am a free talent with residence in Argentina and I have worked on several decorous projects that meet the latest design trends. I work under the vision of meaningful programming, where every component is optimized and reusable. Having a good eye for product evolution helps me to prioritize tasks, iterate fast and deliver faster.
